entry.source: {F812}Jonathan\0{F87A,3}{F87B,3,6,1,1}{F813,0,147003}Now that you mention it... there is a{F801}sweet scent in the air.{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Jonathan\0{F87A,3}{F87B,3,6,1,1}{F813,0,147003}Now that you mention it... there is a{F801}sweet scent in the air.{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Walter\0{F87A,4}{F87B,4,12,1,1}{F813,0,147004}I know we'll be in severe trouble if{F801}we're caught, but I feel oddly{F801}lighthearted in spite of myself...{F801}
